content: this is a ** free 1 ** crochet pattern to make a cute scrap dragon almost every piece is crocheted into the dragon except the wings and ears this dragon measures 5 5 long from the tail to the nose ** become a stringydingding member to unlock my current and future crochet patterns as pdfs learn more and join here 2 ** 1 https //stringydingding com/scraptacular-dragons-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //members stringydingding com/
